elfarol

Class AgentRan

  • java.lang.Object
    • elfarol.AgentRan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent

    public class AgentRan
extends java.lang.Object
implements Agent
    An agent that predicts attendance by picking a random number between the highest and lowest attendance values that it remembers.
    See Also:
    Agent

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentRan()
      Initializes a new Random agent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAttending()
      Returns the value of attend.
      static int randomInRange(int min, int max)
      Returns a random int between min and max
      void updateAttendance()
      Makes the agent update its attendance level based on its attendance prediction by its best evaluated strategy.
      void updatePredictions()
      Does nothing as this agent does not require beliefs updating.
